entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a student who is planning to go to the ball with Angelina. He is described as being prompt and without embarrassment when asking her.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who is surprised that Fred has already asked Angelina to the ball.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is a student who agrees to go to the ball with Fred. She is described as giving him an appraising look before agreeing.

entities.name: alicia spinnet
entities.description: Alicia Spinnet is a student who is chatting with Angelina near the fire.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is watching Ron's card castle being destroyed.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is a student who is asked by Fred to use a school owl.

relationships.description: Fred asks Angelina to the ball, and she agrees.
Ron is surprised that Fred has already asked Angelina to the ball.
Angelina is chatting with Alicia Spinnet near the fire.
Fred asks George to use a school owl.
